title: "TransferSingle" event is not emited in the function deposit() in SemiFungibleVault.sol Or not even in the solmate SafeTrasferLib. This is not in accodarance with the "Safe Transfer Rules" in EIP-1155. Because of this  all the balance changes are not getting reflected properly.This may be a potential reason for failing tests when fuzzing deposits after a certain number of valid runs.
